title: Rock Gnome Lineage
entryLore: Rock gnomes are the most common type of gnome, celebrated for their inventiveness and hardiness. They are master tinkerers and engineers, always seeking to improve the world through mechanical marvels and alchemical experiments. Their communities are often found near rich veins of ore or in bustling workshops.

traits.name: Tinker
traits.description: You know the [[mending|Mending]] and [[prestidigitation|Prestidigitation]] cantrips. You also have [[proficiency|proficiency]] with [[tinkers_tools|Tinker's Tools]].

traits.name: Clockwork Creation
traits.description: You can spend 10 minutes and 10 GP of materials to create a Tiny clockwork device (toy, fire starter, or music box) that functions for 24 hours or until you dismantle it.
